item.title: Two dead, 18 injured in separate accidents in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: Two people died and 18 were injured in separate accidents in the district on Thursday. The injured are being treated at different hospitals.
A collision between a bus and a tractor left a woman dead, while 18 other labourers suffered injuries near Bannigol village in Lingasugur taluk. The deceased was identified as Sridevi. The injured include the bus driver and some passengers and also the labourers who were travelling in the tractor.
The labourers were on their way to Bannigol for w...]]>
item.author: Public Tv English

item.title: Raichur Microfinance Scam: Four Arrested for Extorting Farmers
item.description: <![CDATA[RAICHUR: The Raichur Rural Police arrested four persons on Saturday for allegedly extorting money from farmers under the guise of microfinance recovery. The suspects are identified as Fayyaz , Sheikh MD Ayub , Syed Shahbaz Ahmed , and Haroon Rashid.Sheikh MD Ayub, who works as a recovery officer at Bajaj Finance, teamed up with three associates to identify individuals with unpaid loans using a mobile application. The group allegedly threatened borrowers by blocking their vehicles on the road and...]]>
